basics.summary: Senior HFT Systems Developer with 9+ years of expertise in designing and implementing ultra-low latency trading platforms in C++. Proven track record of developing high-performance, scalable systems that meet the demanding requirements of financial markets. Skilled in optimizing execution speed, reducing trading latency, and improving reliability under extreme transaction loads. Extensive experience with networking, multi-threading, and performance tuning in C++ to build robust, fault-tolerant systems. Passionate about leveraging technology to deliver competitive advantages in high-frequency trading environments.
